com.gensym.util
Class G2ConnectionTable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.Dictionary
        |
        +--java.util.Hashtable
              |
              +--com.gensym.util.G2ConnectionTable
public class G2ConnectionTable
extends Hashtable

G2ConnectionTable is a Hashtable with the following behavior: Any instances of a G2Access that are put in the table, as either a key or a value, will automatically be removed when the connection closes.

See Also:
